did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Dept. of Housing and Dining Services records, 1946-1969

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. Department of Housing and Dining Services.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Collection includes menus, records of reunion events, plans and renovations of dining halls, photographs, and other records pertaining to Cornell University housing and dining. Also includes material concerning questionnaires which were sent to 18 eastern universities, and evaluation of the questionnaires.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Collection includes menus, records of reunion events, plans and renovations of dining halls, photographs, and other records pertaining to Cornell University housing and dining. Also includes material concerning questionnaires which were sent to 18 eastern universities, and evaluation of the questionnaires.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Dept. of Housing and Dining Services records, #42-1-1598. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Files concerning reunion events (1946-1967); events at the Moakley House (1970); Perkins Inauguration (1963); conferences (1956-1969); Purchasing procedures (1961); Milk displays (1957-1962)

Handwritten menus in bound ledgers (1935-1957); Residential Commission on Housing and Dining correspondence, memos (1968-1969); Ad Hoc Subcommittee on Student Dining (1967); Willard Straight renovation records (1950s); Newspaper clippings concerning housing (1946-1960); Photos of various dorms and Pleasant Grove Apartments; Centennial celebration-correspondence, memos (1964)

Handwritten menus in bound ledgers (1957-1966) and typed menus (1967-1969); Questionnaires completed by dining facilities on other campuses (1965); Project 66-Housing Project; Noyes Club, Willard Straight Hall, Johnny Parson Club; Baker renovation files (1950s-1960s); Notice to Dietitians (1957-1965); Veteran Housing Inventory (1948-1950); Catering Service brochure (1970)
Contains correspondence, photos and plans concerning renovations to various dining spaces on campus
